text: Guivry is a commune. It is in the Hauts-de-France region in the Aisne department in the north of France. In 2015, 251 people lived there. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D7, D35, D926 and D927 roads pass through the commune. == Location == The commune borders the Oise department. == References == Category:Communes in Aisne
title: Guivry
